attributes.additional_details:
if I walked into a bank and tried to obtain genuine money in return for a fake cheque, I would be breaking the law and be liable to be arrested.
yet young people are given information in schools that is described as education and yet if put under a spotlight and carefully examined it turns out to be like a fake cheque.
but amazingly those "cheques" are allowed by the government to keep being passed and yet if a fake cheque is of no benefit then how can bad information be of value?
when will the government change the law regarding education?
